name: XWUI Affix Component
description: Affix component that pins an element to the viewport when scrolling. The element becomes fixed when it reaches a specified offset position, maintaining its position relative to the viewport.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

offset.description: Offset in pixels from the top or bottom of the viewport when affixed

position.description: Position where the element should be affixed

target.description: Target container element or selector string. Element will be affixed relative to this container. If not provided, uses document.body

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the affix element

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

content.description: Content to display in the affix element. Can be a string or HTMLElement
